name: Palm Sugar Sharbat
description: This sharbat is a popular Indian drink to beat the summer in India, made using palm sugar.
directions: Add Palm Sugar in a blender and blend it.
Then add cumin seed in the blender and blend it
After this add cocunut water and water in the blender and blend it.
At last add the basil seend into the drink
Now wait for the drink to get cold
Your Drink is ready, Enjoy this yummy drink!
